subject: Re: Order #SSN4819, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,

These didn’t arrive, only the brackets and the elastomers but no VAM’s?

On Sun, 4 Jan 2026 at 20:30, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Samuel, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

I still have no VAM’s and you’ve still not refunded the base plate. I
received the pedals, that are great, and the mounts and elastomers but no
VAM’s.

Hi sam levy,  Have you received your pedals yet? Please take a photo of all the items you received and send it to us. I will help check whether any parts are missing and confirm if the order was shipped in separate packages.

Everything I have received. As you can see, no VAM modules.

I love the pedals though, they are incredible.

On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 08:14, service@simsonn.com
Hi sam levy,    Great, thanks for your prompt feedback. Have fun!

Having lots of fun. These are great!

Brilliant pedals, I didn’t need the white elastomers, got used to the brake
now, so much better than my Moza SR-P’s

On Thu, 8 Jan 2026 at 11:43, service@simsonn.com
